parse.title: List of universities in Venezuela by enrollment

text.*:
This is a list of universities and other higher education institutions in Venezuela by size of student population, it only reflects the institutions with a source of enrollment, those with no information of the enrollment, were not shown.

This list is incomplete; you can help by expanding it.
Universities and other higher education institutions with student population and their location
Rank Institution Total students Cities
(Headquarter in bold)[A] 		Ref.
3 Universidad Central de Venezuela
(UCV) 		57,569 Caracas, Maracay and Cagua [1][2]
2 Universidad de Carabobo
(UC) 		60,916 Valencia, Maracay and San Carlos [3]
9 Universidad Nacional Experimental de Guayana
(UNEG) 		14,563 Puerto Ordaz and Ciudad Guayana [4]
4 Universidad de Los Andes
(ULA) 		54,595 (only in Mérida city) Mérida, San Cristóbal, Trujillo, Tovar, El Vigía [5]
1 Universidad del Zulia
(LUZ) 		75,977 Maracaibo, Cabimas and Punto Fijo [6]
10 Universidad Simón Bolívar
(USB) 		11,228 Caracas and Naiguatá [7]
5 Universidad de Oriente
(UDO) 		46,752 Cumaná, Barcelona, Maturín, Ciudad Bolívar, Porlamar, Puerto Ordaz, Carúpano and Anaco. [8]
8 Universidad Católica Andrés Bello
(UCAB) 		16,339 Caracas, Los Teques, Ciudad Guayana and Coro [9]
11 Universidad Metropolitana
(UNIMET) 		5,500 Caracas, Valencia, Maracaibo, Guatire and Puerto La Cruz [10]
6 Universidad Rafael Belloso Chacin
(URBE) 		31,277 Maracaibo [11]
7 Universidad Gran Mariscal de Ayacucho
(UGMA) 		17,500 approx. Barcelona, Anaco, El Tigre, Maturín, Ciudad Bolívar and Ciudad Guayana [12]
12 Universidad Indígena de Venezuela
(UIV) 		810 Tauca and some indigenous villages in Bolívar state and Amazonas state [13][14]

  7. ^ http://www.topuniversities.com/universities/universidad-sim%C3%B3n-bol%C3%ADvar-venezuela

  9. ^ http://www.topuniversities.com/universities/universidad-cat%C3%B3lica-andres-bello
